column4: kde, on the other hand, uses qt for rendering which i've been told is 'slightly' better
weird thing is, like firefox on linux vs. windows - windows sites are readable, linux i have to sit there and tweak it to get it to actually look right. same browser, same website, different os...
i get half a headache reading websites right now. i'll check in ##gnome
I know what you're saying, a lot of the fonts (even after installing the msttfcorefonts package) still look screwed, and I even set the font to the same default that it is in windows
